scripts.push-results: [ -z "$PROJECT_ACCESS_TOKEN" ] && echo "Error: missing PROJECT_ACCESS_TOKEN from CucumberStudio project to push results" || echo curl -X POST -F messages=@messages.json https://studio.cucumber.io/cucumber_project/results -H "project-access-token: $PROJECT_ACCESS_TOKEN" -H "provider: github" -H "repo: cbliard/coffee-machine" -H "branch: master" -H "revision: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)"
